title: Did Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Say ‘Under Capitalism, Man Oppresses Man. Under Socialism, It’s Just the Opposite’?
subtitle: It seems a little unlikely that a 29-year-old would be the originator of an "old Soviet joke" several decades old.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Newly elected Democratic Party Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said, "'Under capitalism, man oppresses man. Under socialism, it's just the opposite.'"
